block_comment: This single line of Verilog code assigns the least significant bit of the "trc_ctrl" vector to the "trc_enb" signal. In essence, it controls whether a specific tracing feature is enabled or disabled in the design based on a configuration bit in the "trc_ctrl" vector. This is a common idiom used to enable or disable functionalities dynamically in a hardware design module, creating flexibility within the system for various operating modes.
